General.Name: China Animal Husbandry Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: China Animal Husbandry Industry Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells animal health and nutrition products in China. The company offers veterinary drugs and vaccines, veterinary biological products, and feed and feed additives, such as corn and corn by-products, soybean meal, fish meal, and lysine. It also trades in raw materials. The company was founded in 1998 and is based in Beijing, China.

1.Name: Mr. Zheng Hai  Zhang
1.Title: Deputy GM & GM of Chemical Pharmaceutical Bus. Segment
